BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-14 12:11
Subject: RE: Repossi The Galleria Mall Boutique Opening
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

Hope you are doing well,

 

It was pleasure connecting with you to discuss the opening preparations of Repossi Boutique The Galleria Sowwah Mall. As highlighted by 3D; opening would be rescheduled to 2nd week of March 2025.

 

Attached is the list of actions, along with task owners and corresponding time frames, to ensure timely completion and readiness.

 

These tasks have also been assigned on the FOCUS platform, where you are required to update the completion status accordingly.

 

Best regards,

 

 

MOHAMED BATA​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

ABU DHABI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971508158454

 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 


‑

Sent: Friday, January 10, 2025 9:22 AM
Subject: Repossi The Galleria Mall Boutique Opening
When: Monday, 13 January 2025 3:30 PM-4:00 PM (UTC+04:00) Abu Dhabi, Muscat.
